escalate: ESC if cx wants their account name to be changed
ESC if cx complains that their order was canceled
If cx's ask when their order will arrive/estimated delivery date
‚ûú  Ask what shipping method they selected at checkout
‚ûú If it's standard shipping use STS shortcut
‚ûú If they insist to know exactly when ESC
Cx gets a code for free shipping for the first purchase; you can escalate any issues after troubleshooting
tone: Don't thank the cx for the purchase, thank them for their continuous support
Don't ask the customer to contact the courier
drive_to_purchase: Don't D2P when the cx already made a purchase
promo_and_exclusions: Free shipping code is only valid for standard shipping
Standard shipping charge is usually ~ $20, if you see a charge higher than that, it means the method selected is NOT standard (create a mock cart to double-check)

conversation.message_text: Venus et Fleur: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Venus et Fleur: Welcome to Venus et Fleur! I'm Megan, your personal concierge and we are excited to have you experience our Eternity¬Æ Blooms. I've arranged for Complimentary Standard Shipping on your first order with the code MZZ7KRM5. 

Discover our garden of Real Flowers That Last A Year: 
https://venusetfleur.attn.tv/aiQKT0wcMmdc

Venus et Fleur: Happy Valentine's Day! üåπ There's STILL TIME to surprise them with Real Flowers That Last A Year. 

Order by 12 NOON TODAY to receive your order with HAND-DELIVERY. (Available Only in the Tri-State Area) 

Make their day: venusetfleur.attn.tv/aJFW8C4sZtky

Venus et Fleur: Enjoy Complimentary Standard Shipping for only a few more days. 

You can use your exclusive code MZZ7KRM5 at checkout. Shop Eternity¬Æ florals for any occasion here:venusetfleur.attn.tv/a9URthUj-42S

- Megan

Venus et Fleur: Hello, thank you for reaching out! How can I help you?
I've been waiting for a delivery today

Venus et Fleur: I'm really sorry about this, and surely, this isn't the experience I want you to have. Rest assured that feedback will be sent to the team regarding this. To help with this, may I also ask for your order number and email address?

escalate: ESC restock inquiries, but use STOF shortcut first
tone: Close the convo if the cx first message doesn't warrant a response (e.g. Them thanking us, saying they're browsing, etc.)

For prescription orders questions use RPO shortcut

conversation.message_text: Shady Rays: For a limited time, enjoy 30% OFF Sunglasses with a Snow purchase! Get your gear for the sun and the slopes: shadyrays.attn.tv/abz6o57FHTpn

Shady Rays: Our Valentine's Day Sale is live! Get 40% off when you buy 2 or more pairs.

Save now & spread the love: shadyrays.attn.tv/aSLXXTflhPzQ

Shady Rays: Last Chance! Our Valentine's Day sale ends tonight. Save 40% on 2+ pairs while you can. 

Shop Now: shadyrays.attn.tv/aPw04H98Wd2Q

Shady Rays: Back by popular demand: Azalea & Calico. The retired shades you loved are back! 

Shop the launch: shadyrays.attn.tv/a-2041T1_wVx

Shady Rays: Hey , this is Sam. Thanks for stopping by! shadyrays.attn.tv/ajtT-sxPba2B .

Can I help with any questions on our shades?
I lost my pair of glasses, do you happen to remember which pair it was I ordered?
I think they were Allure but I can't find my order email to make sure before I order. :)

I'll be happy to look into this with my team! Also, please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.

Sorry I have no idea what email it was.
Shady Rays: No worries at all! I've passed this on to my team and I'll get back to you as soon as I get an update.

send_to_cs: Send to CS immediately for post-purchase issues
Send to CS for payment processing issues
tone: Don't tell customers that we'll be restocking
Close the conversation when a customer responds 'no'
templates: If a cx reaches out regarding the Early Access event, use EAE shortcut
For cx reaching out in Spanish use SSC shortcut
For checkout issues use the "Check out Issues" temp
For store item availability, use SPA shortcut
If cx's email doesn't work for early access, use EEA shortcut
dos_and_donts: They occasionally run sign-up campaigns where cx text certain keywords (‚Äúreleases,‚Äù ‚Äúearly access‚Äù) to join a list. If a customer sends a similar keyword:
‚ûú Check the website banner or landing page to confirm if it's a current keyword trigger
‚ûú If confirmed, close the convo, if not you can respond
All clothing is true to size unless otherwise stated on the product page
You can use these sizing charts for reference (for internal use only): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kmra_vOwCJuHoAx9D4L4Qx95rxafHcrqn-ZGutfzLgg/edit?usp=sharing
üÖøÔ∏è If customers say they want to purchase in store - encourage them to buy online & pick up in-store
For store info q's (phone number/additional info) - use the store locator with your VPN turned on!
drive_to_purchase: üÖøÔ∏è If customers are looking for an outfit recommendation/item pairing - direct them to the "shop the look" section on each product page or use the LK shortcut

conversation.message_text: SNIPES: Welcome to SNIPES! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
SNIPES: Welcome to the crew! Download the app and join RESERVE for $10 OFF your first purchase over $75. Download here: snipes.attn.tv/aXcYRzdOK0eh .
SNIPES: Don't forget to save our contact to get exclusive updates!
I'm having an issue please help I tried to add money to the card and it's not letting me purchase

SNIPES: Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear that. Are you trying to use a prepaid card for your purchase? If yes, then our system accepts some cards and may reject others, so if it doesn't go through at checkout, unfortunately, it can't be used as a payment method. Do you have a credit card you could try instead?
I put money on the card Now it won't let me finish purchasing and all I was $10 more what am I doing wrong . I would actually like my money refunded so I could just buy it straight out with my debit

SNIPES: I'm sorry to hear that! Since the order was not placed yet, we're not able to do any refunds. Please use a different card at checkout to finish placing your order. Thank you for your cooperation.
But I put money on the snipes card

SNIPES: My sincere apologies for the inconvenience! Are you referring to a gift card? We currently do not offer the option of using gift cards online. Gift cards can only be used at any of our SNIPES retail stores.
I put money on the snipes reserve card
I've been trying to find a phone number I can call to get in touch with somebody It's so hard to explain anything on text messaging
And now I'm getting this and can't figure out what's going on
Template used: "Customer support"; last updated: 2023-10-25 17:40:05.851

SNIPES: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. As a product specialist, I'm here to assist you with any product and style-related questions. The best way to handle this is to contact our customer support team via this link https://snipes.attn.tv/a7GsBEowRC05 They'll be more than happy to help!
